extendedInfo.description: Everyone likes peace. Everyone wants peace. With Peace to go, everyone can make peace. Peace Education can be fun. 230.000 participants in CISV International's programs already enjoyed this idea for more than 60 years and now it can be on your phone!Whether it is in the class room, with friends, or with your NGO, Peace to go supports you to explain and educate the idea of peace wherever and whenever you want.Peace to go is an application about peace education. It uses interactive methods and games to introduce the user into peace educational theory, peace activity planning and peace educational activities.If you want to give feedback or get in touch with us please visit us at http://www.peacetogo.org or on our facebook page. There you also get more information and everything you need to present this app!
